alert.note: Alert for Southern Foothills; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 1:21AM MST until December 03 at 4:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills and the Western Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
